---
title: Unified Parkinson’s Disease Rating Scale (UPDRS)
---



- Part I: Mentation, Behavior, Mood
- Part II: Activities of Daily Living (Determine for “on” or “off”, indicating either a “good” or “bad” day, respectively.)
- Part III: Motor Examination
- Part IV: Complications of Therapy (in the past week)
- Part V: H&Y staging scale
- Part VI: S&E ADL scale


The motor score of the UPDRS can be predicted by the [Mini-BESTest]({{< var ref-mini-bestest.path >}}) @kingComparingMiniBESTestBerg2012.

# Clinical Use

- Used in studies to measure [motor disease severity]({{< var ref-parkinsons-disease.intervention.motor-disease-severity >}}) @osbornePhysicalTherapistManagement2022
